title: My game keeps freezing and I keep having to wait a long ass time. its ANNOYING RIOT HELP
body: Ok, so everytime im minding my own business playing ranked. Then whenever a ban happens or something that would cause moving of frames, my client freezes and I have to end up waiting almost an hour sometimes trying to play a goddamn game. Any fixes? Oh yea my screen also glitches where everything disappears and I have to hover over it to get it back and the stuff on the left where it shows the roles is glitched too, please HELP

replies.body:
Something really funky seems to be going on here.  It is hard to say whether this is some sort of connection issue or a hardware/software display issue where your computer simply isn't able to render Champion Select properly.  Given that a connection issue is much more common, I would like this rule this out first as a possible root cause.  To that end, make sure to complete all of the steps found in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  There are a lot of steps there, but they are all crucial in hopefully resolving this issue and keep you connected to our PvP.net Servers (the client).

Let me know if nothing seems to help!
